data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.

data.author: Charles J. Givens
data.quote: To design the future effectively, you must first let go of your past.

data.author: Lydia Lunch
data.quote: If someone says 'grunge' or 'punk,' you know what the sound is, but if you say 'No Wave,' it's kind of mysterious. That was the most interesting part and should have been the most inspirational thing about it... here's this collective sonic insanity, and none of it sounds anything alike.

data.author: Vanessa Williams
data.quote: Success is the sweetest revenge.

data.author: Anna Neagle
data.quote: The time I had waited probably made the difference between success and failure.

data.author: Edgar Cayce
data.quote: There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!

data.author: Kevin Rollins
data.quote: Well, you would have to say what is the criteria to determine the success of any merger? It would have to be that the companies are stronger financially, that they took market share, and they are on a very steady footing in terms of their performance.

data.author: Alex Noble
data.quote: Success is a process, a quality of mind and way of being, an outgoing affirmation of life.

data.author: Helen Keller
data.quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.

data.author: Mikhail Lermontov
data.quote: Happy people are ignoramuses and glory is nothing else but success, and to achieve it one only has to be cunning.

data.author: Thomas J. Watson
data.quote: Whenever an individual or a business decides that success has been attained, progress stops.

data.author: J. Paul Getty
data.quote: Formula for success: rise early, work hard, strike oil.

data.author: Robert Frost
data.quote: The best way out is always through.

data.author: Guy Laliberte
data.quote: We're not afraid of risking what was our success yesterday in order to explore some new field. We're adventurous. We like the challenge of unknown territory, unknown artistic field, and that's what stimulates us.

data.author: Denis Waitley
data.quote: Personal satisfaction is the most important ingredient of success.

data.author: Kevin Plank
data.quote: Brand is not a product, that's for sure; it's not one item. It's an idea, it's a theory, it's a meaning, it's how you carry yourself. It's aspirational, it's inspirational.

data.author: Samuel Johnson
data.quote: Life affords no higher pleasure than that of surmounting difficulties, passing from one step of success to another, forming new wishes and seeing them gratified.

data.author: Steven Sinofsky
data.quote: When you delegate work to the member of the team, your job is to clearly frame success and describe the objectives.

data.author: Robert H. Schuller
data.quote: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?

data.author: Christopher Morley
data.quote: There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way.
